channel.title: Curious?
channel.description: This ones manly aimed at mods. The question is why in the rules does it state that you [b]No longer play RuneScape[/b], when.. we have a Official RuneScape section now?

item.title: Curious?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:347568”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=443947.msg3370992#msg3370992 date=1287237209]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=443947.msg3266358#msg3266358 date=1278887059]

I don’t play runescape, but it doesn’t stop me from discussing it, right? And this is just a runescape discussion forum, so it doesn’t violate the TOS.
[/quote]Well, isn’t it more… “just a runescape private server discussion forum”?

I think people would start to get bored of discussing Runescape Private Servers. I’m aware of the General Discussion board besides Runescape’s. Though I still think it makes sense.
[/quote]I think people would start to get bored of a topic and no longer reply to it. I’m aware that someone replying to one of these dead topics is called a ‘gravedig’. Though I still think that it needs to be locked.[/quote]

Your right about that. I don’t see the Grave-Digged Threads being locked at all to be honest. Though I suppose they haven’t gotten to the reports or something?

I have no idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Curious?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:347568”]He put that in our TOS because technically if we don’t play runescape anymore we are no longer bound by the Jagex Terms of Service, which state that we can’t reverse engineer their client.[/quote]Even though, he is still going against what he wants people to accept when coming to the website & accepting the TOS.

Read full topic

item.title: Curious?

item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

He put that in our TOS because technically if we don’t play runescape anymore we are no longer bound by the Jagex Terms of Service, which state that we can’t reverse engineer their client.

item.title: Curious?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Basically, Jagex claims monetary damages against impsoft because impsoft encouraged users to break jagex's TOS. (which I think is complete bullshit, but IANAL)

Therefore, if one of the provisions of this site’s TOS says you can’t be subject to Jagex’s TOS to use this site, then there is no way anything on this site is encouraging you to break that TOS (because you aren’t subject to it). Understand? Good, now I’m going to lock this thread because the discussion is over.

MITB lives in a dream world though. This isn’t one of the biggest cheating sites anymore. Jagex probably doesn’t even view this site.

Read full topic
